[Fault tolerance]

Checkpoint service to load checkpoint fileThe FT::LoadCheckpointService::service expose both client and server interface to load checkpoint file from the Store service. In order to load a checkpoint file, the implementation re-play the stored message (the checkpoint file) with new destination (the node that requires the checkpoint file) and new service identifier (the LoadCheckpointService::service). Detailed Description

Checkpoint service to load checkpoint file

The FT::LoadCheckpointService::service expose both client and server interface to load checkpoint file from the Store service. In order to load a checkpoint file, the implementation re-play the stored message (the checkpoint file) with new destination (the node that requires the checkpoint file) and new service identifier (the LoadCheckpointService::service).

Util::ComFailure::Code FT::LoadCheckpointService::find ( ChkId  chkid,
Net::GlobalId  gid_server,
std::list< ChkId > &  objectlist 
)

List all the objects that match chkid from the checkpoint server with gid 'gid_server' The method is blocking.

Parameters:
[in] the pattern of the checkpoints to load (can use ChkId::ALL_xxx)
[in] gid_server the gid of a checkpoint server where to load user context
[out] the output list of chkid object
Returns:
OK if the load successfully complet

void FT::LoadCheckpointService::initialize (  ) 

Initialization of the object

Reimplemented from Util::Object.

Util::ComFailure::Code FT::LoadCheckpointService::load ( ChkId  chkid,
Net::GlobalId  gid_server,
std::map< ChkId, void * > &  objectmap 
)

Load all the objects that match chkid from the checkpoint server with gid 'gid_server' The method is blocking. If no thread is found on the checkpoint server then no threads are added to the list. All loaded objects are appended to map objectmap (chkid -> object).

Parameters:
[in] the pattern of the checkpoints to load (can use ChkId::ALL_xxx)
[in] gid_server the gid of a checkpoint server where to load user context
[out] the output map of object ( chkid that matches -> associated object )
Returns:
OK if the load successfully complet
void FT::LoadCheckpointService::terminate (  ) 

Terminate the use of the object This method should be called after any use of other methods of the interface.

Reimplemented from Util::Object.
